mapper.insert: insert into employee (employee_no, employee_name, employee_sex, employee_age, employee_salary, employee_hiredate, dept_no) values (#{employeeNo,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{employeeName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{employeeSex,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{employeeAge,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{employeeSalary,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{employeeHiredate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{deptNo,jdbcType=INTEGER})

mapper.update:
update employee
employee_name = #{employeeName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
employee_sex = #{employeeSex,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
employee_age = #{employeeAge,jdbcType=INTEGER},
employee_salary = #{employeeSalary,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
employee_hiredate = #{employeeHiredate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
dept_no = #{deptNo,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where employee_no = #{employeeNo,jdbcType=INTEGER}
